languages.text:
"Слабость узрев в сочленении крепкой брони,
{mf|Крикнул|Знак подала} эттфатер Ульфару, чтоб бил без пощады,
Выхватил нож Громогласный, и с криком суровым
Взрезал коварного духа нечистую плоть.

"A weakness spying
in the strong armour's joins,
The Aett-Vater to Ulfar {mf|cried out|a sign gave}
that a ruthless blow
he should strike.
His knife drawing,
and a harsh cry unleashing,
Thunderlung plunged the blade
into the insidious spirit's foul flesh.
languages.original_text:
"Слабость узрев в сочленении крепкой брони,
{mf|Крикнул|Знак подала} эттфатер Ульфару, чтоб бил без пощады,

languages.text:
「強靭な鎧の接合部に
弱点が垣間見えた
アエット＝ヴァテルはウルファーに
無慈悲な一撃を与えよと
叫んだ
彼は短剣を引き抜き
そして厳しい咆哮を放ち
サンダーラングはその刃を
陰湿な精霊の汚らわしい肉体に突き刺した。
languages.original_text:
"A weakness spying
in the strong armour's joins,
The Aett-Vater to Ulfar {mf|cried out|a sign gave}
that a ruthless blow
he should strike.
His knife drawing,
and a harsh cry unleashing,
Thunderlung plunged the blade
into the insidious spirit's foul flesh.

languages.text:
“狼领注意到敌人
铠甲的关节业已破损，
便{mf|出言提醒|打个手势}
要对那里
发起致命的进攻。
只听一声龙吟，
雷狼拔剑出鞘，
利刃没入无耻恶徒的
肮脏血肉之中。”
languages.original_text:
"A weakness spying
in the strong armour's joins,
The Aett-Vater to Ulfar {mf|cried out|a sign gave}
that a ruthless blow
he should strike.
His knife drawing,
and a harsh cry unleashing,
Thunderlung plunged the blade
into the insidious spirit's foul flesh.

languages.text:
« Repérant un défaut
dans les articulations de l'armure,
l'aett-vater à Ulfar {mf|cria|fit un signe}
pour l'inciter à frapper
impitoyablement.
Tirant sa lame
et poussant un cri sauvage,
Voix-du-Tonnerre plongea sa lame
dans l'ignoble chair
de l'esprit malveillant. »
languages.original_text:
"A weakness spying
in the strong armour's joins,
The Aett-Vater to Ulfar {mf|cried out|a sign gave}
that a ruthless blow
he should strike.
His knife drawing,
and a harsh cry unleashing,
Thunderlung plunged the blade
into the insidious spirit's foul flesh.

languages.text:
«Un punto débil atisbó
en la articulación de la recia armadura,
y {mf|el|la} Aett-Vater a Ulfar {mf|proclamó|señaló}
que un golpe certero
debía asestar.
Cuchillo en la mano
y rugido en los labios,
Pulmón Atronador la hoja hundió
en la carne hedionda del espíritu malvado».
languages.original_text:
"A weakness spying
in the strong armour's joins,
The Aett-Vater to Ulfar {mf|cried out|a sign gave}
that a ruthless blow
he should strike.
His knife drawing,
and a harsh cry unleashing,

into the insidious spirit's foul flesh.

languages.text:
"Eine Schwäche in den
Nähten der starken Rüstung erblickend
{mf|rief der Aett-Vater Ulfar zu|gab der Aett-Vater Ulfar ein Zeichen},
dass einen gnadenlosen Hieb
er ausführen sollte.
Sein Messer zückend
und einen wilden Schrei ausstoßend
rammte Donnerlunge die Klinge
in das widerwärtige Fleisch des tückischen Geists.
languages.original_text:
"A weakness spying
in the strong armour's joins,
The Aett-Vater to Ulfar {mf|cried out|a sign gave}
that a ruthless blow
he should strike.
His knife drawing,
and a harsh cry unleashing,

into the insidious spirit's foul flesh.

languages.text:
"Güçlü zırhın eklemlerinde
Bir zayıflık gizleniyordu.
{mf|Ulfar'a seslenen|Ulfar'ı işaret eden} Aett-Vater,
Acımasız bir vuruşla
Saldırmasını istedi.
Bıçağını çekti,
Acılı bir feryat koptu.
Tufanciğer, sapladı bıçağını
Hain ruhun iğrenç bedenine.
languages.original_text:
"A weakness spying
in the strong armour's joins,
The Aett-Vater to Ulfar {mf|cried out|a sign gave}
that a ruthless blow
he should strike.
His knife drawing,
and a harsh cry unleashing,
Thunderlung plunged the blade
into the insidious spirit's foul flesh.

traits.locale_text:
"Güçlü zırhın eklemlerinde
bir zayıflık gizleniyordu.
Aett-Vater, Ulfar'a {mf|seslendi|işaret etti}
acımasız bir vuruşla
saldırmasını istedi.
Bıçağını çekti
ve acılı bir feryat koptu.
Tufanciğer sapladı bıçağını
hain ruhun iğrenç bedenine.
